name: Rectangle
description: The rectangle shortcode lets you create a rectangular banner for a SINGLE product.
notes: You will get the product id from the products URL on Overstock.com. For instance, the product URL "http://www.overstock.com/Home-Garden/DHP-Emily-Grey-Linen-Chaise-Lounger/9747008/product.html" has a product ID of 9747008.

optional_attributes.name: width
optional_attributes.description: Width of the shortcode element. This attribute accepts "px" or "%"

optional_attributes.name: link_target
optional_attributes.description: Choose how to open the link.
